News.Title: MITCON Consultancy & Engineering Services: Mukul Agrawal Sells Shares Worth Rs 1 Crore
News.Summary: Ace investor Mukul Mahavir Agrawal sold over 1.3 lakh shares of MITCON Consultancy & Engineering Services for Rs 1 crore via a block deal at Rs 80.52 per share. The stock surged 8% on NSE, closing at Rs 88. MITCON reported a Q4FY25 consolidated net profit of Rs 1.7 crore, up from Rs 1.6 crore year-over-year, while revenue fell to Rs 39 crore from Rs 42 crore.
